revised_title: The Comparative Effects of Cobra and Krait Venom on Nerve Function and Vital Functions
tldr: This study compares the effects of cobra and krait venom on nerve function and vital functions in animals. The researchers found that while the symptoms of krait poisoning are similar to those of cobra poisoning, they differ in relative degree, making it doubtful if they can be considered identical. The study also shows that krait venom has a greater impact on motor nerve-end paresis than cobra venom.
